title: Texas police: Father kills wife, son, daughter, then himself
content:
The Fort Bend County Sheriff's Office says the bodies were discovered Tuesday morning in the Katy area.
Sheriff's spokesman Bob Haenel says it appears the man shot his family, including two children under the age of 5.
Haenel says a relative of the victims had asked deputies to check on the family, and that's how their bodies were found.
A sheriff's statement identified the dead as 37-year-old Jeremy Raju Srinivasan, his 35-year-old wife Natalie Altier Srinivasan, and their 5-year-old daughter and 2-year-old son. All were shot to death.
Officials are trying to determine what prompted Tuesday's shootings.
